trans-unit.source: Hosts an ActiveX control as an element within Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) content.
trans-unit.target: Hospeda um controle ActiveX como um elemento dentro do conteúdo do WPF (Windows Presentation Foundation).

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.ActiveXHost> class to host an ActiveX control as a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Interop.ActiveXHost> classe para hospedar um controle ActiveX como um <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>.

trans-unit.source: Currently, support is limited to windowed controls.
trans-unit.target: No momento, o suporte é limitado a controles de janela.

trans-unit.source: The parent window.
trans-unit.target: A janela pai.

trans-unit.source: Creates the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.ActiveXHost" /> window and assigns it to a parent.
trans-unit.target: Cria a janela <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.ActiveXHost" /> e a atribui a um pai.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.HandleRef" /> to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.ActiveXHost" /> window.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.HandleRef" /> para a janela <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.ActiveXHost" />.

trans-unit.source: A structure that contains the window handle.
trans-unit.target: Uma estrutura que contém o identificador de janela.

trans-unit.source: Destroys the hosted window.
trans-unit.target: Destrói a janela hospedada.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <see langword="false" /> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.ActiveXHost" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados pelo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.ActiveXHost" /> e libera opcionalmente os recursos gerados.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Interop.ActiveXHost.Dispose(System.Boolean)" /> method has been called on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.ActiveXHost" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o método <see cref="M:System.Windows.Interop.ActiveXHost.Dispose(System.Boolean)" /> foi chamado na instância <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.ActiveXHost" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.ActiveXHost" /> instance has been disposed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.ActiveXHost" /> instância tiver sido descartado; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The size of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost" /> object.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho do objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the size of the window represented by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost" /> object, as requested by layout engine operations.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o tamanho da janela representada pelo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost" /> do objeto, conforme solicitado por operações de mecanismo de layout.

trans-unit.source: The size of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost" /> object.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho do objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost" />.

trans-unit.source: The event data to the access key event.
trans-unit.target: Os dados de evento para o evento de chave de acesso.

trans-unit.source: The event data reports which key was invoked, and indicate whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager" /> object that controls the sending of these events also sent this access key invocation to other elements.
trans-unit.target: Os relatórios de dados de evento cuja chave foi chamada e indica se o objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager" /> que controla o envio desses eventos também envia essa chamada de chave de acesso a outros elementos.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for when an access key that is meaningful for this element is invoked.
trans-unit.target: Fornece tratamento de classes para quando uma chave de acesso que seja significativa para esse elemento é chamada.

trans-unit.source: The event data that describes the property that changed, as well as old and new values.
trans-unit.target: Os dados de evento que descrevem a propriedade alterada, bem como valores novos e antigos.

trans-unit.source: Invoked whenever the effective value of any dependency property on this <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" /> has been updated.
trans-unit.target: Invocado sempre que o valor efetivo de qualquer propriedade de dependência nesse <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" /> for atualizada.

trans-unit.source: The specific dependency property that changed is reported in the arguments parameter.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de dependência específica alterada é relatada no parâmetro de argumentos.

trans-unit.source: Overrides <see cref="M:System.Windows.DependencyObject.OnPropertyChanged(System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs)" />.
trans-unit.target: Substitui <see cref="M:System.Windows.DependencyObject.OnPropertyChanged(System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs)" />.

trans-unit.source: The window's position.
trans-unit.target: A posição da janela.

trans-unit.source: Called when the hosted window's position changes.
trans-unit.target: Chamada quando a posição da janela hospedado é alterada.
